ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of EUGÉNIE BROUILLET of Québec, Quebec, to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments for Quebec Seats, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months.
